item.title: About Us
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description: Our History and Mission The UC Riverside Postdoctoral Association (RPA) was formed in 2014 by former UCR postdocs Anna Locke, Carol Davis, Elia Scudiero, Jorge Lozano Juste, Laetitia Poedivin, Lisa Pang, Marco Schiavon, and Poonamjot Deol. Their vision was to conceive an association that nurtures a professional and social network among postdoctoral and visiting scholars and project scientists ‚Äî postdocs. The association has an important advisory role giving the Graduate Division input on the needs of the postdoctoral community at UCR.

item.title: Donate
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description: To best serve the postdoctoral community members at UCR, which hosts ~250 postdoctoral scholars, ~60 visiting scholars, and ~100 project scientists, we encourage each UCR department to donate an annual contribution of $30 per affiliated member. This donation will go towards professional networking events and a yearly symposium to showcase and celebrate the research Postdocs at UCR are doing. Please consider donating to our FAU: A01383-19900-43-DEPDA. Please email postdoc@ucr.edu to let us know when you have made the donation and the amount.

item.title: Entertainment
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description: Riverside Being the most populated city in the Inland Empire and Riverside County, the city of Riverside offers a lot of attractions to locals and visitors. Explore Riverside Together Downtown Farmers Market Mission Inn Museum Riverside Metropolitan Museum Riverside Art Museum The Cheech: Chicano Art & Culture Riverside Heritage House UCR Arts Fox Performing Arts Center Municipal Auditorium Riverside Main Library Sycamore Canyon Wilderness Park Mount Robidoux CA Citrus State Historical Park

item.title: Event Calendar
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description: Find here academic and non-academic events relevant for the postdoctoral community. All UCR affiliates are welcome to participate too.

item.title: Meetups
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description: [Stay tuned for updates! Page under construction üöß] Want to meet others who love the same activities you love and build a community? Then you are in the right place! Meetups is a UC Riverside Postdoctoral Association initiative that fosters leisure group activities among the UCR community. Create and join group events on specific activities such as sports, road trips, outdoor activities, museum visits, movie nights, social gatherings, among others, and let people with similar interests get to know them.

item.title: Postdoctoral Symposium
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description: [Stay tuned for updates! 2023 Symposium Info will be available soon üöß] The UC Riverside Postdoctoral Association holds an annual symposium featuring oral and poster presentations and invited speakers. Registration is free and open to all. üó£Ô∏è Contributed talks are open to postdoctoral and visiting scholars and project scientists. Each speaker will have 10 minutes to present with 2 minutes for questions. ü™ß Posters are open to postdoctoral and visiting scholars, project scientists, and graduate students.
